mapper.insert: insert into shop_premium_item_tbl values( shop_premium_item_idx_seq.nextval, default, #{shopItemIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userIdx}, sysdate, default )
insert into shop_power_item_tbl values( shop_power_item_idx_seq.nextval, default, #{shopItemIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userIdx}, sysdate, default )
